name.ja: プライム・トラクタイガー

summoning_condition.en: You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 monster. If you do, its original ATK becomes 1800.

requirement.en: Send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Choose 1 face-up monster on your field. If it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).
